721012f-a.text:
Lexington Avenue, east side, from East 48th to 49th Street's, showing the newly completed Hotel Shelton. Arthur Loomis Harmon, the architect was awarded the Architectural League of New York Medal Award of 1925
for this design.
About 1926

713322f-a.text:
East 48th Street, north side, east from (No. 141), but net including
Lexington Ave. Nos. 1414147, are being demelished.
September 28, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
